name: NBCNews
text:
Opinion | Erik Edstrom: "We were taught to say, 'Ma’am, this flag is presented to you on behalf of a grateful nation for the honorable and faithful service rendered by your loved one.'

But this time, that was not enough." - @NBCNewsTHINK https://t.co/qe0SGgkLRD

name: NBCNews
text: WHO warns of "immediate second peak" in countries where coronavirus infections are declining. https://t.co/e4mXp0ooIk

name: NBCNews
text:
On Ep. 18 of #IntoAmerica: @trymainelee talks to comedian, actress, podcast host, and author Michelle Buteau about the value of comedy in a pandemic.

Listen now: https://t.co/8TufpAycvp https://t.co/vsRyis3MGi

name: NBCNews
text: President Trump says he's no longer taking hydroxychloroquine. https://t.co/aGK1k52iea

name: NBCNews
text: Colleges are laying off their adjunct faculty, which mostly consists of women and people of color. https://t.co/AzqDQFUv6v

name: NBCNews
text:
People wearing masks ride a roller coaster at Lagoon Amusement Park in Utah. Officials said a new reservation system is in place to help manage social distancing and avoid crowding at the park entrance

See more as states reopen and celebrate Memorial Day: https://t.co/6wreMFrRMg https://t.co/UWEmW6GeJg
